titleStmt.title: A paraphrase on the book of Job as likewise on the songs of Moses, Deborah, David, on four select psalms, some chapters of Isaiah, and the third chapter of Habakkuk / by Sir Richard Blackmore.
titleStmt.author: Blackmore, Richard, Sir, d. 1729.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Awnsham and John Churchill,
